Name: Decent Checkers
About the game: Key features Shared, local and online multiplayer: you can play against a friend in a relaxed atmosphere and have a good time. You can also try playing against a stranger if the game is going to be popular enough! Full single player (PvE) matches: 4 supported rulesets (International, Brazilian, English/US, Russian) and a 3 AI difficulty levels to choose from! Puzzles: English/US and Russian rulesets, a total of 40 fun puzzles which will help increase your understanding of different rulesets and make you a better Checkers player.
